programme.title: Looking for Paradise
programme.desc: Inspired by Vite di uomini non illustri by Giuseppe Pontiggia and directed by Mario Monicelli, this film follows Claudia Bertelli, born in Milan in 1949 to a middle-class family. Educated in England, Claudia's life unfolds through diverse roles: rebellious single mother, feminist, wife, doctor in developing countries, and finally a mystical nun. Each phase reflects changing ideals, forming a portrait of a woman exploring identity across different stages of her life.

programme.title: Getaway of Love
programme.desc: Giuliana leads a normal life; she has been married for 10 years to Martino, a less-than-passionate husband more devoted to his employment than to her. One day two thugs break into the supermarket where she works. A handsome policeman, Leonardo, comes to stop the robbery. A boundless attraction arises between the two, which will lead them to extreme choices in order to stay together.

programme.title: Bed of a thousand pleasure
programme.desc: A whimsical reimagining of the famous 1001 Nights, filled with intrigue, romance, and fantasy.

programme.title: The erotic dreams of Cleopatra
programme.desc: Cleopatra’s erotic dreams become a canvas for desire, power, and a seductive love affair.

programme.title: Ben and Charlie
programme.desc: The pair of small-time hustlers settle in a town with the intention of conning the locals out of their money. This time, however, the duo will end up outsmarting themselves.

programme.title: Champagne in paradise
programme.desc: A group of friends experiences a life-changing journey filled with humor, romance, and life lessons.

programme.title: The Killer Reserved Nine Seats
programme.desc: Patrick Davenant invites a group of friends and his daughter to his family-owned theater. Within a short time, the guests realize that they are trapped. A masked killer begins to murder them one by one.

programme.title: The Clan
programme.desc: Franco and Dino, two mechanics from Rome, leave for Las Vegas to participate in the Harley-Davidson world meeting. They count on winning the reward provided for participants. But their real big dream is different. It is music. The two of them sing and dance to pieces by Frank Sinatra and Dean Martin without thinking that this could become a profession.

programme.title: Poker in bed
programme.desc: Love, rivalry, and high-stakes games mix in a witty tale of ambition and seduction

programme.title: The erotic dreams of Cleopatra
programme.desc: Cleopatra’s erotic dreams become a canvas for desire, power, and a seductive love affair.

programme.desc: The pair of small-time hustlers settle in a town with the intention of conning the locals out of their money. This time, however, the duo will end up outsmarting themselves.

programme.desc: A group of friends experiences a life-changing journey filled with humor, romance, and life lessons.

programme.desc: Patrick Davenant invites a group of friends and his daughter to his family-owned theater. Within a short time, the guests realize that they are trapped. A masked killer begins to murder them one by one.
